LanguageData.MF_Module_AmmoBackpack.label: ammo backpack module
LanguageData.MF_Module_AmmoBackpack.description: A belt-fed ammunition backpack that connects to compatible weapons, providing continuous ammo supply without manual reloading. Not compatible with rockets, missiles, or grenades.
LanguageData.MF_Module_AmmoBackpack_Heavy.label: heavy ammo backpack module
LanguageData.MF_Module_AmmoBackpack_Heavy.description: A large belt-fed ammunition backpack with double capacity. Occupies both the attachment slot and right shoulder mount. Not compatible with rockets, missiles, or grenades.
LanguageData.MF_Module_AmmoBackpack_Light.label: compact ammo box module
LanguageData.MF_Module_AmmoBackpack_Light.description: A lightweight ammunition box mounted on the left arm. Smaller capacity but leaves the backpack slot free. Not compatible with rockets, missiles, or grenades.
LanguageData.MF_Apparel_AmmoBackpack.label: ammo backpack
LanguageData.MF_Apparel_AmmoBackpack.description: A belt-fed ammunition backpack module installed on an exosuit.
LanguageData.MF_Apparel_AmmoBackpack_Heavy.label: heavy ammo backpack
LanguageData.MF_Apparel_AmmoBackpack_Heavy.descriptio: A large belt-fed ammunition backpack module with double capacity.
LanguageData.MF_Apparel_AmmoBackpack_Light.label: compact ammo box
LanguageData.MF_Apparel_AmmoBackpack_Light.descriptio: A lightweight ammunition box mounted on the left arm.
